name: BASTRA Try
description:
Play among up to 6 players in the most addictive classic strategic cards game from asia and around, that has made Real Time and Fancy for you, with cool classic cards deck, fancy looking game.

Try to defeat our AI Players. Especially Tamara, the most smart one.
You can play among up to 4 Game Center players in a match.

Free version. Please, Consider to buy the game on App Store, to show some appreciation, and to eliminate ads.
